page.title: 16FOLK CUSTOMS
page.content: The Christian Calendar is well remembered and practised especially Harvest Services and Supper.Ducking for apples on Halloween and Bonfire Night are children's festivals.Old medicinal recipes are often used by the old folk.Elder tea was drunk to sweat out colds.Yarrow tea was taken to dissolve the stones in the kidney s.Fizzy herb beer was made from numerous herbs and fermented with yeast.Honey drinks and blackcurrant tea soothed the throat.Mallow made a healing ointment and docks rubbed on nettle stings gave relief.A recommended cure for chilblains was to immerse them in a chamber pot of urine,or possibly to apply a holly switch.Goose grease on stockings cured sore chests.Elder branches or twigs were used to make patterns on sanded kitchen floors around the hearth.
